title: Market share of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Streaming Device in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
Streaming Device Apple TV has the highest Market share and Tivo has the lowest Market share.
The highest Streaming Device Apple TV has 37.0 more Market share than the lowest Streaming Device Tivo.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 5 number of Streaming Devices.
The maximum Market share 43.0 is found at Streaming Device Apple TV and the minimum is found at Tivo where Streaming Device is 6.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Streaming Device in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
Streaming Device Apple TV has the highest Market share and Tivo has the lowest Market share.
The highest Streaming Device Apple TV has 37.0 more Market share than the lowest Streaming Device Tivo.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Streaming Device, and Market share in each Streaming Device on the y axis.
Streaming Device Apple TV has the highest Market share and Tivo has the lowest Market share.
Streaming Device Roku has the second highest value for Market share.
The highest Streaming Device Apple TV has 37.0 more Market share than the lowest Streaming Device Tivo.
Market share at Streaming Device Apple TV is 43.0 , second place is Roku at 24.0, and thirdly is Chromecast at 14.0.
The Streaming Device Tivo tends to be 2.15 percent lower than average.
The Market share is 100.0 if we add up values of all Streaming Devices.
